name: RandomService_hexTest
description: Unit tests for the hex method in the RandomService class.

test_cases.name: testHexWithZeroLength
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a length of zero, both with uppercase and lowercase options.

test_cases.name: testHexWithPositiveLengthUppercase
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a positive length and uppercase option, ensuring the generated string is of the correct length and contains only valid uppercase hexadecimal characters.

test_cases.name: testHexWithPositiveLengthLowercase
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a positive length and lowercase option, ensuring the generated string is of the correct length and contains only valid lowercase hexadecimal characters.

test_cases.name: testHexWithNegativeLength
test_cases.description: Tests the hex method with a negative length, both with uppercase and lowercase options, ensuring an empty string is returned.
